TopicTitle: How to find lost parts in modded games

Articles.Content:
Hello, I was wondering if someone could help explain how to figure out if a part has been moved to a new research node. I'm playing a with a moderate sized mod-list, and today I realized that the Hitchhiker container is missing. I've provided my modlist in case someone offhand knows where it would have gone, but in general, is there a way to look through mod configs or the MM log to see where parts get assigned to nodes?

modlist : https://pastebin.com/EVQEfqVA

Thanks!

You might try looking in ModuleManager.ConfigCache - should be in the same directory as the MM dll - this contains the patched cfg files so you should be able to see what KSP is using for the TechRequired field.

8 hours ago, wasml said:

You might try looking in ModuleManager.ConfigCache - should be in the same directory as the MM dll - this contains the patched cfg files so you should be able to see what KSP is using for the TechRequired field.

Very helpful thank you - I found it
